biography: Gerald I. Shulman, MD, PhD, MACP, MACE, FRCP, is an American physician-scientist specializing in endocrinology and metabolism. He is the George R. Cowgill Professor of Medicine (Endocrinology) and Professor of Cellular and Molecular Physiology at the Yale School of Medicine. Shulman also serves as Co-Director of the Yale Diabetes Research Center.
aiSummary: Gerald I. Shulman is a metabolic physiology specialist with an H-index of 182 at Yale University (Faculty). Has been published in Nature Reviews Disease Primers, Nature, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in United States.
